title: Implement Knowledge Pack Retrieval Service
description: Implement the retrieval service for the NextGen AI Knowledge Pack, including vector search against nxtg_facts.jsonl. Return compact facts pack snippets with source identifiers and enforce token/byte cap. Integrate with Lane B ReasoningEngine for Retrieval-Augmented Generation injection.
acceptance_criteria: Retrieval service loads and indexes nxtg_facts.jsonl
Vector search returns facts pack structure with topic, facts, and disclaimers
Token/byte cap is enforced on results
Service integrates with Lane B for Retrieval-Augmented Generation injection
